sentences.en: Analyses the operation effect of total heat exchangers applied to emporium area.
sentences.cn: 分析了商场部分全热交换器的应用效果.

sentences.en: As farfetched as the Celestial Emporium system is, any classification process has its logical problems.
sentences.cn: 牵强如天朝分类法, 任何分类都有其逻辑的问题.

sentences.en: But I do not reduce sell it in emporium, it depends the country condition.
sentences.cn: 但是我不会缩减在大商场的销售, 这要视情况而定.

sentences.en: Foodstuffs , Medicine, Patent Medicine, Emporium, Garment, Arts & Crafts .
sentences.cn: 食品, 药材,成药, 日用百货, 服装, 工艺品.

sentences.en: For example , the Yaxiya Emporium , Suguo Supermarket , Times Supermarket, and Dynasty Store have various commodities.
sentences.cn: 亚细亚商城 、 苏果超市 、 时代超市、名店王朝等大型现代化购物场所林立 、 商品丰富.

sentences.en: Here in Menghai, the newly opened six-story emporium built to house hundreds of buyers and bundlers is a very lonely place.
sentences.cn: 现在的勐海，新开张的六层大百货商场十分冷清，它原本为数以百计的商家而建。

sentences.en: IT is 7:30 on a Sunday night, andat Guixi, large and popular downtown food emporium here.
sentences.cn: 现在是星期天晚上的7点半, 位于闹市区的贵溪饭店正在不断地上客.

sentences.en: SK : Good morning, sir! Welcome to the Polearm Emporium!
sentences.cn: 早上好, 先生! 欢迎来到长柄武器商场!

sentences.en: Some TV sets for sale in the emporium were stolen last night.
sentences.cn: 那家商场用来出售的部分电视机昨晚被盗.

sentences.en: Yet within just four years the international emporium had collapsed, with catastrophic losses.
sentences.cn: 然而仅仅过了4年这国际大商场就因灾难性的损失而轰然倒闭.
